price: (187) So cause to fall upon us fragments of the sky, if you should be of the truthful."
arabic: فَأَسۡقِطۡ عَلَيۡنَا كِسَفٗا مِّنَ ٱلسَّمَآءِ إِن كُنتَ مِنَ ٱلصَّٰدِقِينَ

version.title: English Translation - Saheeh International
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into English - Saheeh International - Al-Muntada Al-Islami (Islamic Forum)

meta.transliteration: fa-asqiṭ ʿalaynā kisafan mina al-samāi in kunta mina al-ṣādiqīna
